description: Full-featured email client K-9 Mail is an open source email client that works with basically every email provider. Features * Supports multiple accounts * Unified Inbox * Privacy-friendly (no tracking whatsoever, only connects to your email provider) * Automatic background synchronization or push notifications * Local and server-side search * OpenPGP email encryption (PGP/MIME) Install the app OpenKeychain: Easy PGP to encrypt/decrypt your emails using OpenPGP. Support If you're having trouble with K-9 Mail, ask for help in our support forum. Want to help? K-9 Mail is a community developed project. If you're interested in helping to improve the app, please join us! You can find our bug tracker, source code, and wiki at https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android. We're always happy to welcome new developers, designers, documenters, translators, bug triagers and friends.
